drives.name: Swing Jazz
drives.piece_set_four: Launching a Chain Attack or Ultimate increases all squad members' DMG by 15% for 12s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

drives.name: Chaotic Metal
drives.piece_set_four: Whenever a squad member inflicts Corruption on an enemy, that enemy takes 18% more DMG for 12s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

drives.name: Hormone Punk
drives.piece_set_four: Upon entering or switching into combat, the equipper has their ATK increased by 25% for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

drives.name: Fanged Metal
drives.piece_set_four: Whenever a squad member inflicts Assault on an enemy, the equipper deals 35% additional DMG to the target for 12s.

drives.name: Shockstar Disco
drives.piece_set_four: Basic Attacks, Dash Attacks, Dodge Counter, Special Attacks, and EX Special Attacks inflict 15% more Daze upon the main target.

drives.name: Thunder Metal
drives.piece_set_four: As long as an enemy in combat is Shocked, the equipper's ATK is increased by 27%.

drives.name: Woodpecker Electro
drives.piece_set_four: Triggering a critical hit with a Basic Attack, Dodge Counter, or EX Special Attack increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated seperately.

drives.name: Soul Rock
drives.piece_set_four: Upon receiving an enemy attack and losing HP, the equipper takes 40% less DMG for 2.5s. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

drives.name: Puffer Electro
drives.piece_set_four: Ultimate DMG increases by 20%. Launching an Ultimate increases the equipper's ATK by 15% for 12s.

drives.name: Inferno Metal
drives.piece_set_four: Upon hitting a Burning enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate is increased by 28% for 8s.

drives.name: Freedom Blues
drives.piece_set_four: When an EX Special Attack hits an enemy, reduce the target's Anomaly Buildup RES to the equipper's Attribute by 35% for 8s. This effect does not stack with others of the same attribute.

drives.name: Polar Metal
drives.piece_set_four: Basic Attack and Dash Attack DMG increases by 28%. Whenever a squad member Freezes or Shatters an enemy, the buff further increases by 28% for 12s.

drives.name: Proto Punk
drives.piece_set_four: When any squad member triggers a Defensive Assist or Evasive Assist, all squad members deal 15% increased DMG, lasting 10s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

drives.name: Chaos Jazz
drives.piece_set_four: Fire DMG and Electric DMG are increased by 15%. When off-field, DMG dealt by EX Special Attacks and Assist Attacks is increased by 20%. When the character switches back onto the field, this buff continues for 5s. The lasting effect can be triggered once every 7.55.

drives.name: Branch & Blade Song
drives.piece_set_four: When Anomaly Mastery exceeds or equals 115 points, the equipper's CRIT damage increases by 30%. When any squad member applies Freeze or triggers the Shatter effect on an enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, lasting 15s.

drives.name: Astral Voice
drives.piece_set_four: Whenever any squad member enters the field using a Quick Assist, all squad members gain 1 stack of Astral, up to a maximum of 3 stacks, and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of Astral increases the DMG dealt by the character entering the field using a Quick Assist by 8%. Only one of this effect can be active at a time in the same squad.

drives.name: Shadow Harmony
drives.piece_set_two: The DMG of Aftershocks and Dash Attacks is increased by 15%.
drives.piece_set_four: Upon hitting an enemy with an Aftershock or Dash Attack, if the DMG dealt aligns with the equipper's attribute, the equipper gains 1 stack of a buff effect, at most once per use of a skill. For each stack, the equipper's ATK increases by 4%, and CRIT Rate increases by 4%. The effect can stack up to 3 times and lasts for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

drives.name: Phaethon's Melody
drives.piece_set_four: When any squad member uses an EX Special Attack, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the EX Special Attack is not the equipper, the equipper's Ether DMG is increased by 25%.
